net.darmo_creations.utils.version

Class Version

  • java.lang.Object
    • net.darmo_creations.utils.version.Version
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    java.lang.Comparable<Version>

    public final class Version
extends java.lang.Object
implements java.lang.Comparable<Version>
    This class represents a version number of the following format: 
     $MAJOR.$MINOR[.$PATCH][d]
    • $MAJOR: major version
    • $MINOR: minor version
    • $PATCH: patch version (only displayed if not 0)
    • d: indicates that this is a development version
    E.g.: 1.2, 2.0.6d, 3.4d, 1.0.6â€¦
    Author:
    Damien Vergnet
